oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Case study: Spinosad
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kromp, Bernhard
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quality and evaluation of inputs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Contents - The spinosad working group - Brief specifications of spinosad - The testrun process: “applicant” vs. “evaluators” agreements & differences - Conclusions of the “evaluation” testrun: key issues in favour or causing concern - Experiences from using the matrix - Final (preliminary) recommendation & open questions
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kromp, Bernhard (2005) Case study: Spinosad. Paper at: Evaluating inputs for organic farming - a new system, Belgium, Brussels, 13.10.2005. [Unpublished]
